name: ぷる萌えノベル【鈴鐘りょう】
summary:
『ぷる萌えノベル【鈴鐘りょう】』は、メイド「りょう」ちゃんとのドキドキなストーリーが展開していくアプリ。ノベル形式で話とタッチアクションが一緒に楽しめる。
--
[Attention!] with bud voice
RYO SUZUKANE to work part-time in the housemaid cafe meets the classmate in the shop by chance. 
She was a little bold to seduce him ... anxious classmates.
This game has adopted a novel format, you can enjoy both the story and the touch-action.
There is a story branch to expand the exciting story.

With extra stage
(adobe air)
info:
• 英文名: Puru-Moe Novel!(Ryo Suzukane)
  • 平台: Android
  • 游戏类型: アーケード＆アクション
  • 开发者: digicharaworks
  • 游玩人数: 1
  • 发行日期: 2010-12-27
  • 售价: JP¥210
  • 官方网站: https://market.android.com/details?id=air.PuruMoe1B
